definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
to accept wholeheartedly/to embrace/to be won over

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脫水和發燒可用口服補液鹽和對乙酰氨基酚進行治療。

sentences.english: Intraenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允許口服液體補充靜脈體液量。

sentences.english: May potentiate oral anticoagulants, others that prolong bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 口服抗凝血劑，會增強，也有人認爲延長出血。

sentences.english: Control group were not treated with sensory reeducation or oral intake of methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 對照組未給予感覺再訓練及口服彌可保片劑治療。

sentences.english: But there's no proof that taking colloidal silver by mouth has any benefits.
sentences.chinese: 但並沒有證據證明口服膠銀有任何益處。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型的口服抗艾滋病毒藥物屬於整合酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: As the main human oral absorption by poisoning, lethal dose of 10 to 5 milliliters.
sentences.chinese: 人類主經經口服吸收中毒，致死量爲10～5毫升。

sentences.english: ORS and zinc bring the risk of death down to almost zero.
sentences.chinese: 而口服補液鹽和補鋅可幾乎完全消除死亡危險。

sentences.english: When taken orally, bisphosphonates are poorly absorbed and have low bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 口服雙磷酸鹽的吸收率及生物利用度非常低。

sentences.english: Oral birth control pills contain hormones that prevent ovulation and reduce the severity of menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 口服含激素的藥片會阻止排卵和降低痛經的嚴重度。

sentences.english: If antiperspirants don't help you the doctor may switch over to Oral Medications.
sentences.chinese: 如果止汗不幫你的醫生可能會切換到口服藥物。

sentences.english: We need the drops, and we need them soon.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要口服滴劑，而且愈快愈好。

sentences.english: V. , or bivalent oral polio vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 雙價口服脊髓灰質炎疫苗。

sentences.english: In control group, the patients were treated with oral valium.
sentences.chinese: 對照組以口服安定片治療。

sentences.english: Aim The oral drops of dermatophagoides farinae for the inhibition of allergy was studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討粉塵蟎口服滴劑的抗過敏作用特點。

sentences.english: Oral contraceptives work by reducing androgens .
sentences.chinese: 口服避孕藥，會減少雄性激素。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
